full_summary:
## Tender Title
Steveston Paramount Building 25 – New Electrical System
### Tender ID
cb-799-92664887

## Tender Overview
Fisheries and Oceans Canada is seeking a new electrical distribution system for the newly constructed Industrial and Commercial Building (Building 25) located at Steveston Paramount, 12740 Trites Road, Richmond, British Columbia, V7E 3R8.

## Scope of Work
The selected contractor will be responsible for designing, installing, and commissioning a new electrical distribution system, including:

* A fully equipped low-voltage electrical room with a 75kVA, 480:120/208 3PH transformer, distribution panels, breakers, metering, and required grounding and bonding for all new equipment.
* Provision and installation of new grounding and bonding of all new equipment in accordance with the Canadian Electrical Code.
* Installation of a new Central Distribution Panel (CDP) 600A, 347/600V, 3PH, 4W, and a new house panel at 400A, 3Phase, 4W, 84CCT within the new electrical room.
* Provision and installation of new heaters, data outlets, power receptacles, lighting, lighting controls, and other miscellaneous devices throughout the building.
* Complete connection of all mechanical devices and power for the new lift charger.
* Commissioning of the electrical system.

## Project Timeline
The contract is expected to commence on April 1, 2024, and is expected to be completed by July 31, 2024.

## Trade Agreements
The selected contractor must comply with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Procurement Details
This tender is open to all contractors who meet the mandatory requirements specified in the attached Request for Qualifications (RFQ). A limited number of contractors will be shortlisted to proceed to the second phase, where they will be invited to submit a financial bid on the project.

## Security Clearance
No security clearance is required for this project.

## Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
Lana Hunt
Phone: (604) 355-0314
Email: DFO.Tenders-Soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
Available documents can be found at this [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31497/30005087---request-for-qualification-%28en_final.pdf).
